creator: reshmi.anr@gmail.com
text:
Hi,

We are using log4j-1.2.11.jar. The requirement at our end is to log all the “java.util.logging” related logging messages to custom log files using log4j.xml.

I see “jul-log4j-bridge” can be used to achieve this requirement from the URL http://people.apache.org/~psmith/logging.apache.org/sandbox/jul-log4j-bridge/intro.html. However the URL also mentioned that “This library will not work with log4j 1.2.14 or earlier”.

Could you please let me know the way to configure these “java.util.logging” related log messages to custom log files using log4j.xml (version 1.2.11). 

Thanks in advance. 

Regards, 
Reshmi

creator: hoju@visi.com
text:
If you are able to add a new library (jul-log4j-bridge.jar) to your project, why are you not able to upgrade your current version of Log4j to the latest (or at least 1.2.14) as required by the jul-log4j-bridge library?

The requirement is not arbitrary.  Your only option (other than modifying source code yourself) is to upgrade Log4j to comply with the requirement.
